name: Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile
membership: Euro NCAP, ERTICO, AFCAR, Forum for Mobility & Society, Mobility for Prosperity in Europe, UNECE (observer) UNECE World Tourism Organisation, ITF, Mobility as a Service Alliance, Mobility for Prosperity in Europe
goal:
Among FIA's primary goals are to uphold the interests of its membership in all international matters concerning automobile mobility and motor sport and to preserve and conserve all documents concerning world motoring in order to trace its history.
In the area of mobility, the FIA's goal is to ensure safe, affordable, clean and efficient mobility for all.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
GEAR2030
Type-approval Regulation of motor vehicles
Intelligent Transport Systems
Connected and automated driving
Digital Single Market
Vehicle emissions regulations
Road safety policies
Motor insurance
Tourism policies
